idCitation.resTitle: Oregon Water Right Places of Use

citRespParty.rpOrgName: Robert Harmon, GISP, Oregon Water Resources Dept., GIS Coordinator

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Depicts the location of each water right place of use (POU) polygon and provides basic information about the associated water right. All current and individually held water rights are shown in this data set except for those held by irrigation districts, applications, temporary transfers, instream leases, and limited licenses.

Current code definitions at: https://www.oregon.gov/owrd/WRDFormsPDF/wris_code_key.pdf.

Compilation procedures document at: https://arcgis.wrd.state.or.us/data/OWRD_WR_GIS_procedures.pdf.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Water right Places of Use (POU) in the state of Oregon.

Consts.useLimit: This product is for informational purposes and may not have been prepared for, or be suitable for legal, engineering, or surveying purposes. Users of this information should review or consult the primary data and information sources to ascertain the usability of the information.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Last name of the water right holder. *May not be the most current name.
Allowed water right use (code).

edom.edomvd: fish habitat for resident Borax Lake Chub
best use of waters from storage

attr.attrdef: Water right permit file number
Allowed acreage for this use from the current water right document.
Water right claim character. Only applies to those rights created through an adjudication of claims.

edom.edomvd: Klamath Adjudication (following Final Order of Determination)

attr.attrdef: First name of the water right holder. *May not be the most current name.
Water right claim file number. Only applies to those rights created through an adjudication of claims.
Water right application character.
Additional notes from technician. Generally includes an explanation of the placement method. List standard remarks can be found in the mapping procedures document.
Water right application file number.
Primary water right database key. Useful for relating point of diversion and place of use attributes for a given water right.
Link to database report of water right attributes that this place of use is associated with.
Feature geometry.
Water right POU use database key.
Predominate water right source type.
Agency of the technician editing the POD.
Water right certificate file number.

The total difference between the acreage on the current water right map and document (permit, certificate, or transfer). It is expressed as a negative number for an "underage" (WR map acreage less than document), a positive number for an "overage" (WR map acreage more than document), "0" where the overages and underages total zero, and null for no overage or underage.
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
